subject: College Athletics
Computer and Video Games
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Basketball (College)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A federal judge approved a $60 million settlement for college athletes in a class-action lawsuit filed against the N.C.A.A. and the video game maker Electronics Arts.
snippet: A federal judge approved a $60 million settlement for college athletes in a class-action lawsuit filed against the N.C.A.A. and the video game maker Electronics Arts.
